ping.help: used to test connectivity to the bot

help.help: Prints the help for a command, for a list of commands do the commands command

roll.help: Rolls a die/dice accepts multiple inputs. EX: roll 20 | roll d20 | roll 2d20 | roll d%

avatar.help: Other Command; Pretty useless, makes the bot post a high res version of its avatar

ids.help: Makes bot send a message with the users channel id and user id

math.help: Makes bot evaluate a math expression

status.help: Makes bot report the status of a specific user and if they are offline state when they went offline. EX: status username | status @username

commands.help: Makes the bot DM the user issuing the command a list of commands

poke.help: Pretty useless, makes bot DM a user saying that someone poked them in a channel and state the user that issued the command and channel name. EX: poke @username

stats.help: Makes bot print out current tracked stats for a user. EX stats | stats @username | stats username

ignore.help: Makes bot ignore all commands and logging on a channel to unignore a channel do: ignore remove

yt.help: Makes the bot search youtube for a video, user, or playlist. EX: yt query

xkcd.help: Makes the bot post a random xkcd comic, or search for a specific one using keywaords. EX: xkcd | xkcd query

announce.help: Makes a bot announce userchanges on a channel, toggalable, issue command again to turn off, only works on one channel

cat.help: Makes bot post a random cat picture

snake.help: Makes bot post a random snake picture

pug.help: Makes bot post a random pug picture

redditscenery.help: Makes bot post a random picture from a list of subreddits more specifically the SFW network https://www.reddit.com/r/sfwpornnetwork/wiki/network . EX: redditscenery | (random subreddit) | redditscenery subreddit | redditscenery list

js.help: Only the bot owner can issue this command, it runs raw javascript and is potentially harmful to the bot

verb.help: bot owner only, disallows message and status output to console

uptime.help: Makes the bot send its current uptime

info: This bot has been coded by Seth177 it is designed to be a simple chat bot combining useful commands I've seen across a few bots but never really unified together in a way I really wanted. To see a list of commands do the issue the commands command, if you need help on what a command does issue the help command followed by the command you need help with
